ing: 1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste
des: "Use your favorite beans if you do not like these. Tasty beans without the sugar. I love the fiery taste of Tabascoâ„¢, but you might want to back off that ingredient to remove some of the blister."
ins: In a saucepan over medium heat, combine the black beans and black-eyed peas with their juices. Season with garlic powder, cumin, ginger, salt, onion flakes, mustard, and hot pepper sauce. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer for about 20 minutes to combine the flavors.
